rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a creature spell scry 1.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
Tap four untapped creatures you control with flying: Obscure target card in your graveyard. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
